alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 12:22AM CDT until April 13 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1222 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jones to near Darnell to near Mangham, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Monticello around 1225 AM CDT. Transylvania and Alsatia around 1240 AM CDT. Lake Providence, Millikin and Shelburn around 1245 AM CDT. Tallulah around 100 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mound, Delta and Richmond. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
